lead_paragraph: The Sports Business column on Tuesday, about the treasures stored beneath the National Baseball Hall of Fame, misstated the title of Tom Shieber, a Hall employee. He is the senior curator — not the chief curator, the position held by Ted Spencer.
snippet: The Sports Business column on Tuesday, about the treasures stored beneath the National Baseball Hall of Fame, misstated the title of Tom Shieber, a Hall employee. He is the senior curator — not the chief curator, the position held by Ted Spencer.
